title: Must See Beautiful 2 Bedroom Unit in NoPa
posting_body: Kitchen: Open Kitchen W/ Stove, Fridge, and Dishwasher - New Cabinets
This unit is rich in color and design.
Beautiful hard wood floors, oak cabinets and stainless steel appliances!
Security cameras and parking included in rent!
WELCOME TO NOPA - Known for the history of being the origin of the hippie counterculture, it still holds some of the historical roots that keep it in place.

The Club Deluxe welcomes those that want to relax with jazz music and smooth drinks in this intimate nightclub atmosphere, while Zazie caters to those that would like a beautiful brunch atmosphere on their large outdoor patio.
The Urban School of San Francisco located in Haight Ashbury for higher education learning.
A traditional grocer for the area is the Haight Street Market.
Selling fresh produce, meats, cheeses, wines and other fine foods from the surrounding areas.
Haight Ashbury has seen the time change and shows its real roots as you walk down the streets.
NoPa, a neighborhood near the narrow east strip of Golden Gate Park that has hip cafes, quirky shops, and colorful Victorians.
Its diverse collection of restaurants, bars, shops, and surrounding parks makes the neighborhood unique and easily accessible.
Nearby, Alamo Square Park offers impressive views of the city skyline and a row of classic Victorians known as the Painted Ladies.

*This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
